channel.title: Source Control on Codewrecks
channel.description: Recent content in Source Control on Codewrecks

item.title: Correct use of a Source Control System branching for long time task
item.description: Source control system is probably developer’s best friend, but quite often people use only a small percentage of its functionalities. One of the most missed feature is a correct use of a branch. Let’s make a concrete example. Suppose that developer A needs to implement a big feature, it estimates a week to complete it, and while he is working at this feature he needs also to modify some basic part of the system.
